publicationStmt.p: Published as part of ELTE Verskorpusz

div.div_rhyme: aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa aaaa
div.head: Kónyinak
div.p: Laetus in praesens animus, quod ultra est, Oderit curare, et amara lento Temperet risu. Nihil est ab omni Parte beatum.
